title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: If you Reason this current situation, You go see say things hard for this our nation, Naira scarcity all over the nation, fuel still scarce for the fuel station, but all this rubbish fit change by determination, We fit use our PVC decide our future,  make we vote wisely, vote for a man that can do the job, if you no really know the candidates , watch there campaigns , interviews, and follow there track records to see waiting them done before,  any wrong vote na till the next 8years before we go get chance to correct am, so pls let's vote wisely, vote competence, vote a man that won't have challenges ruling the country, make we no suffer again for another 8 years.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: In a general election like this,it doesn't matter whose tribe or religion he or she is? what matters is the capability, fitness,good records and the good agenda, competency, this is what we are looking at not the tribe or religion ok, because tribe or religion have never been our problem in this country rather bad leadership,so please do not discriminate just vote your conscience..

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: This country problem no de finish, as people they talk about how we go use our votes change the country situation by not accepting any form of bribery and not selling their votes. naso I see two people they talk today about how them go take collect bribe for this election say them Don too see shege and na only money de carry dem go election ground. The worst part be say dem no be married men so why dem no go fit just go work to earn money naso I clear them there oo people de find way make country better una de here de think like small children. See the way some of our youths de think abeg. I believe say majority no de like that Sha and make we no use tribalism or nepotism kill ourselves.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Nigeria politicians see election as a do or die affair but these time their plans have failed because if we vote the right person into power,we will see election as a way of voting out corrupt leaders and not giving them the opportunity to manipulate the figures or vote buying. These time let's go out and use our PVC to make a better future in Nigeria for our children and younger ones by voting into power the right man. If the right person is not voted in,it might be another eight years of suffering and lamentation. Tribalism is what has landed Nigeria into this mess she is in,because we feel that tribe is better than competency, which is a wrong orientation.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Nah just one day and some hours nai just remain make the D-Day reach, and everybody blood don dey hot, if you check now you go see say all of them don dust their PVC dey wait for February 25th. And he kon still be like say this issue if new naira join watin put fire for everybody body even those person wen nor first get voting for mind don change their mind all of them don go arrange their selves down. Quote from: Nheer on February 23, 2023, 07:26:03 PMThis country problem no de finish, as people they talk about how we go use our votes change the country situation by not accepting any form of bribery and not selling their votes. naso I see two people they talk today about how them go take collect bribe for this election say them Don too see shege and na only money de carry dem go election ground. You need to understand say nor be everybody body sabi better thing for we kwantry, he just get some when be say their head empty but them go just dey shout, dey argue as if them really know wetin dem dey talk. Those people when you dey talk about so nah dem go be the first set of people when go start to the complain if  GOD FORBID  the wrong leader enter power. Nah them go first start to dey destroy properties if the wrong leader pay deaf ear to their cry and complain.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I tell you that, 8 years is too small, we get chance now to help our dear nation Nigeria, if by any chance, we get it wrong again this time, I tell you say, in the next 40 years, we go still dey suffer wetin go happen for this country, I no dey talk this thing say I feel like to talk, this na pure revelation I dey share with una so..Among all the presidential candidates, anybody wey dey in his or her right senses and truthful to him or her self, know say na Peter Obi na im be the most qualified, me no dey hide my own, i no dey fear anybody, as e be me, na so I go talk am.No go vote for Tinubu, Tinubu no get anything to offer Nigeria, he just won be president because he feels day na him turn to be president - as to him, ruling Nigeria na turn by turn thing.No go vote Atiku, Atiku is not a Nigerian, this man no dey live for Nigeria, he no know wetin Nigerians dey go through, if he become president of this country, na Dubai him go go relax dey Chop Nigeria money, he no go ever know or care about wetin dey happen for this country or the sufferness wey we as citizens dey face.Abeg, vote Peter Obi, na this man na him be the only person wey fit help us rescue this country, forget whether you be igbo, hausa or yoruba, Nigeria na all of us get am, if e good, e go good for all of us, if e bad, na still all of us e bad for ooh, nothing concern tribe concern this one ooh.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: This Saturday na our chance to put who we want make e lead us to the promised land. I like Peter Obi because na businessman e be, and that na wetin  Nigerian need as head of state. Somebody wey go check those contracts wey china dey carry dey come our country. I know say anything wey nor go profit Nigeria, Peter Obi go bounce am once. Abeg make we tell our papa and mama, uncle and aunty make them vote for family nor be umbrella and broom.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Em don clear for everybody eye as em d so. Sae Nigeria election this time around no go because I be this or that. If peso vote because of tribe or religious belief na all of us go suffer am when the wrong peso win. Everyone don learn their lesson for this Buhari regime, say voting base on tribe or religious sentiment no good at all for Nigerians. By tomorrow everything go end. We go now get new president wey go rule us. But As em d so, tensions are rising for this election via who go rule this nation called "Nigeria''. This tomorrow's election just d like the masses against our old corrupt politicians wey no wan leave power for the youths. Na this election go retire many of them if the right peso win for this presidential election. In other words, vote rightly and make your vote count.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on February 23, 2023, 11:28:26 PMI tell you that, 8 years is too small, we get chance now to help our dear nation Nigeria, if by any chance, we get it wrong again this time, I tell you say, in the next 40 years, we go still dey suffer wetin go happen for this country, I no dey talk this thing say I feel like to talk, this na pure revelation I dey share with una so..Among all the presidential candidates, anybody wey dey in his or her right senses and truthful to him or her self, know say na Peter Obi na im be the most qualified, me no dey hide my own, i no dey fear anybody, as e be me, na so I go talk am.No go vote for Tinubu, Tinubu no get anything to offer Nigeria, he just won be president because he feels day na him turn to be president - as to him, ruling Nigeria na turn by turn thing.No go vote Atiku, Atiku is not a Nigerian, this man no dey live for Nigeria, he no know wetin Nigerians dey go through, if he become president of this country, na Dubai him go go relax dey Chop Nigeria money, he no go ever know or care about wetin dey happen for this country or the sufferness wey we as citizens dey face.Abeg, vote Peter Obi, na this man na him be the only person wey fit help us rescue this country, forget whether you be igbo, hausa or yoruba, Nigeria na all of us get am, if e good, e go good for all of us, if e bad, na still all of us e bad for ooh, nothing concern tribe concern this one ooh. I stand with you, no body too righteous but among everybody way come out for this presidential seat nah still Obi be the best option, nah only who no care about in family and generation to come fit go vote for Tinibu or Atiku to come rule diz country again. Diz time around no be party or religion something nah who go deliver we stand out for, nah just few hours to the main day and my vote don already set for Mr. Peter Obi

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 23, 2023, 03:39:16 PMIf you Reason this current situation, You go see say things hard for this our nation, Naira scarcity all over the nation, fuel still scarce for the fuel station, but all this rubbish fit change by determination, We fit use our PVC decide our future,  make we vote wisely, vote for a man that can do the job, if you no really know the candidates , watch there campaigns , interviews, and follow there track records to see waiting them done before,  any wrong vote na till the next 8years before we go get chance to correct am, so pls let's vote wisely, vote competence, vote a man that won't have challenges ruling the country, make we no suffer again for another 8 years.After the whole presidential and national assembly elections wey take place yesterday being 25/02/2023 I com discover say the issue of tribalism, ethnicity and no go fit end for Nigeria election and electorate in making their decisions on preferred candidate. Competency, track records etc no follow for part of the reasons why electorates de tk pick candidates at all, and na big problem Nigerians gat deal with for only God knows how long.
